Datatable.LocalizationPair: +25% Flak Damage vs Squadrons on Fleet
+50% Flak Damage vs Squadrons on Fleet
This branch contains all the Industrialist-specific skills.
After years of researching optimal industrial production patterns across multiple sectors, the Hero gains localized knowledge of the best workflows to maximize Industry output on a given system.
By personally overseeing ship production facilities, the Hero increases overall ship quality
By nationalizing the companies that mine strategics and diverting some of the profits towards local infrastructure development, the system Happiness gets to increase with its available deposits.
The hero creates a "Recipe list" of all the materials required to build basic infrastructure which is then optimized to the local system's resource availability.
By micromanaging damage control teams the hero decreases the overall structural and subsystem damage a ship sustains on impact.
The hero creates search parties dedicated to aggressively searching for new undiscovered deposits.
This branch contains the Scientist-specific skills.
After years of researching optimal scientific research patterns across multiple sectors, the Hero gains localized knowledge of the best workflows to maximize Science output on a given system.
The hero improves shielding to Academy standards, resulting in better shield capacity.

The hero rewards the already high scientific research that happens in cold planets by giving generous donations to researchers and institutions that make important discoveries there, enthusiasm for the sciences increases.
Utilizing reseach techniques learnt in the academy, the hero can streamline the scientific process.
By micromanaging shield power allocation on all ships in their fleet the hero can increase their efficiency.
The Hero allocates some of their personal funds on the research and exploitation of local anomalies and campaigns to maintain public interest in them.
This branch contains the Pacifist-specific skills.
After years of researching optimal income production patterns across multiple sectors, the Hero gains localized knowledge of the best workflows to maximize Dust output on a given system.
The hero seamlessly fuses their personal business dealings with the operation of the fleet, using the profits of the first to cover the costs of the latter.
By nationalizing the companies that extract luxuries and diverting some of the profits towards local infrastructure development, the system Happiness gets to increase with its available deposits.
The hero creates a military grade scavenging fleet and keeps it near the main fleet so any lost ships can be recycled.
The hero creates search parties dedicated to aggressively searching for new undiscovered deposits.
This branch contains the Ecologist-specific skills.
After years of researching optimal crop production patterns across multiple sectors, the Hero gains localized knowledge of the best workflows to maximize Food output on a given system.
By fusing the ship's hull with organic alloys of the heroes' own design, the ship can regenerate some damage on its own.
By establishing a higher pay for workers who work on anomalies the system happiness increases with their cuantity.
The hero declares that the production of waste is unacceptable and starts shaming groups and individuals that produce it, efficiency improves.
Being an expert in biology and psycology, the hero is able to maximize troop capacity without decreasing their health and morale.
The Hero allocates some of their personal funds on the development and exploitation of local anomalies and campaigns to maintain public interest in them.
This branch contains the Religious-specific skills.
After years of researching succesful propaganda campaigns across multiple sectors, the Hero gains localized knowledge of the best workflows to maximize Influence output on a given system.
The hero personaly reviews fleet statistics and performance checks and is free to inform the crew of any optimization they can find.
The hero becomes a public figure and advertizes itself to its assigned citizens, promizing to improve their living situation and keep them safe from foreign threats.
The hero is authorized to optimize and manage all propaganda campaigns in your empire (Including political ones), increasing their effectiveness.
The hero drills into their crew that its their duty to keep the ship running, and encouraging to put the integrity of the ship over their own lives.
The hero is assigned to review performance reports of other heroes and communicate with them on potential points of improvement.
This branch contains the Militarist-specific skills.
After years of researching optimal militarization patterns across multiple sectors, the Hero gains localized knowledge of the best workflows to maximize Manpower output on a given system.
The hero uses neural plugins to connect directly with the weapons systems, increasing their efficiency.
The hero launches a propaganda campaign that advertises the nearest military base as a must have to remain safe while also diverting any spare manpower to high profile charity work.
The hero bypasses ship construction laws to ensure maximum ship to ground ability
The hero perfects a cloning technique that allows the creation of already trained soldiers from other trained soldiers
